IMPLEMENTING THE WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST
WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  26
MONITORING AND EVALUATION FOR IMPROVEMENT
In order to provide birth attendants with ongoing encouragement and support in using the
